function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Indoor air pollution due to biomass and coal smoke","Impact":"Health risks including chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), otitis media, acute respiratory infections, tuberculosis, asthma, and cancer","Mitigation":"Switching to cleaner and more efficient cooking and heating methods","Technologies":"Improved cooking stoves, electric heating appliances","People":"Women, young children, and individuals in developing countries","Owner":"Governments, NGOs, and international organizations"},{"Description":"Premature deaths due to the use of coal and solid biomass for cooking","Impact":"2.8 million premature deaths reported every year","Mitigation":"Promotion of cleaner and safer cooking fuels and technologies","Technologies":"Cleaner cooking fuels, improved cooking stoves","People":"Population relying on coal and solid biomass for cooking","Owner":"Public health agencies, governments, and advocacy groups"},{"Description":"Use of harmful fuels for lighting","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor air pollution and associated health issues","Mitigation":"Promotion of safer lighting alternatives such as electricity-based lighting","Technologies":"Electric lighting, solar-powered lighting","People":"Population using kerosene, candles, and other harmful fuels for lighting","Owner":"Governments, NGOs, and international organizations"}]}
